```{r dot plot for performance by data sets }
#Name main models
ov_results_cBoost$general_model   <- "Gradient Boosting"
ov_results_coxph$general_model    <- "Pen. Cox PH"
ov_results_DeepSurv$general_model <- "DeepSurv"
ov_results_rsf$general_model      <- "Random Survival Forest"
ov_results_coxPas$general_model   <- "Cox PASNet"
ov_results_prio$general_model     <- "Priority Lasso"

# Helper function to add two rows
add_extra_rows <- function(df) {
  # 1) Create an empty DF with the same columns (0 rows)
  new_df <- df[0, ]

  # 2) Add 2 new rows filled with NA
  new_df[1:2, ] <- NA

  # 3) Overwrite the columns of interest
  new_df$ordered_datasets <- c("Block Data", "Pathway Data")
  new_df$general_model    <- df$general_model[1]

  # 4) Combine original data with the new rows
  rbind(df, new_df)
}


# 3) Add extra rows to core models
ov_results_cBoost_dot   <- add_extra_rows(ov_results_cBoost)
ov_results_coxph_dot    <- add_extra_rows(ov_results_coxph)
ov_results_DeepSurv_dot <- add_extra_rows(ov_results_DeepSurv)
ov_results_rsf_dot      <- add_extra_rows(ov_results_rsf)


# define needed columns
keep_cols <- c("ordered_datasets", "ci_cohort1", "general_model")

# add CoxPAS und Priority Lasso
ov_results_cox_pas_dot <- ov_results_rsf_dot
ov_results_cox_pas_dot$general_model <- "Cox PASNet"
ov_results_cox_pas_dot[ , !(names(ov_results_cox_pas_dot) %in% keep_cols)] <- NA
ov_results_cox_pas_dot$ci_cohort1 <- NA
ov_results_cox_pas_dot$ci_cohort1[9] <- ov_results_coxPas$ci_cohort1

ov_results_prio_dot <- ov_results_rsf_dot
ov_results_prio_dot$general_model <- "Priority Lasso"
ov_results_prio_dot[ , !(names(ov_results_prio_dot) %in% keep_cols)] <- NA
ov_results_prio_dot$ci_cohort1 <- NA
ov_results_prio_dot$ci_cohort1[8] <- ov_results_prio$ci_cohort1

# 5) Combine all results (subset to relevant columns)
combined_results <- bind_rows(
  ov_results_cBoost_dot[, c("ordered_datasets", "ci_cohort1", "general_model")],
  ov_results_coxph_dot[, c("ordered_datasets", "ci_cohort1", "general_model")],
  ov_results_DeepSurv_dot[, c("ordered_datasets", "ci_cohort1", "general_model")],
  ov_results_rsf_dot[, c("ordered_datasets", "ci_cohort1", "general_model")],
  ov_results_cox_pas_dot[, c("ordered_datasets", "ci_cohort1", "general_model")],
  ov_results_prio_dot[, c("ordered_datasets", "ci_cohort1", "general_model")]
)



# 6) Plot
plot1 <- ggplot(
  data = combined_results %>%
    filter(!is.na(ci_cohort1)) %>%
    mutate(ci_cohort1 = as.numeric(ci_cohort1)),
  aes(x = ordered_datasets, y = ci_cohort1, color = general_model)
) +
  geom_point(size = 3) +
  scale_y_continuous(limits = c(0.6, 0.8), breaks = c(0.6, 0.7, 0.8)) +
  scale_x_discrete(
    labels = c(
      "all_data"          = "Block Data",
      "autoencoder"       = "Autoencoder",
      "autoencoder+pData" = "Autoencoder + Clin. Data",
      "common"            = "Common",
      "common+pData"      = "Common + Clin. Data",
      "intersect"         = "Intersect.",
      "intersect+pData"   = "Intersect. + Clin. Data",
      "pathways"          = "Pathway Data",
      "pData"             = "Clin. Data"
    )
  ) +
  labs(
    title = "Performance of Models on Cohort 10 by Data Set",
    x = "Data Sets", y = "C-Index", color = "Model"
  ) +
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(
    plot.title = element_text(face = "bold", size = 14),
    axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, hjust = 1),
    legend.position = "bottom",
    legend.direction = "horizontal",
    legend.box = "horizontal",
    legend.justification = "center",
    legend.margin = margin(t = 10, unit = "pt"),
    legend.text = element_text(size = 10),
    legend.title = element_text(size = 12)
  ) +
  guides(color = guide_legend(nrow = 1))
```

```{r dot plot for performance by data sets }


# extract times from one of the AE DeepSurv files (cohort1 high risk)
ae_surv_times_coh1 <- ae_deep_surv_survival_data_coh1_high_risk$time

# create DF for CoxPH survival (just cohort1 as example) and rename columns
cox_ch1 <- coxph_survival_data %>%
  select(time, cohort1_low_risk, cohort1_high_risk) %>%
  rename(
    Survival_CoxPH_LowRisk  = cohort1_low_risk,
    Survival_CoxPH_HighRisk = cohort1_high_risk
  )

# create DF for AE DeepSurv 
ae_deep_ch1 <- data.frame(
  time                     = ae_surv_times_coh1,
  Survival_DeepSurv_HighRisk = ae_surv_coh1_high_vec,
  Survival_DeepSurv_LowRisk  = ae_surv_coh1_low_vec
)

# merge both sets: get all unique times, then left_join
all_times_coh1 <- sort(unique(c(cox_ch1$time, ae_deep_ch1$time)))
survival_df_cohort1 <- data.frame(TimePoints = all_times_coh1)

survival_df_cohort1 <- survival_df_cohort1 %>%
  left_join(cox_ch1,    by = c("TimePoints" = "time")) %>%
  left_join(ae_deep_ch1,by = c("TimePoints" = "time")) %>%
  fill(
    Survival_CoxPH_LowRisk,  Survival_CoxPH_HighRisk,
    Survival_DeepSurv_LowRisk, Survival_DeepSurv_HighRisk,
    .direction = "down"
  )

# Plot survival curves
ggplot(survival_df_cohort1, aes(x = TimePoints)) +
  geom_line(aes(y = Survival_DeepSurv_LowRisk,  color = "DeepSurv Low Risk"),  size = 1) +
  geom_line(aes(y = Survival_DeepSurv_HighRisk, color = "DeepSurv High Risk"), size = 1) +
  geom_line(aes(y = Survival_CoxPH_LowRisk,     color = "CoxPH Low Risk"),     size = 1) +
  geom_line(aes(y = Survival_CoxPH_HighRisk,    color = "CoxPH High Risk"),    size = 1) +
  scale_linetype_manual(values = c(
    "DeepSurv Low Risk"  = "solid",
    "DeepSurv High Risk" = "dashed",
    "CoxPH Low Risk"     = "dotdash",
    "CoxPH High Risk"    = "dotted"
  )) +
  scale_color_manual(values = c(
    "DeepSurv Low Risk"  = "red", 
    "DeepSurv High Risk" = "#ffcd66", 
    "CoxPH Low Risk"     = "darkblue", 
    "CoxPH High Risk"    = "blue"
  )) +
  labs(
    title = "Cohort 10 Survival Curves for Risk Groups and Models",
    x     = "Months",
    y     = "Survival Probability",
    color = "Model & Risk Group"
  ) +
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(
    plot.title   = element_text(face = "bold", size = 14),
    legend.title = element_text(size = 12),
    legend.text  = element_text(size = 10),
    legend.position = "bottom"
  ) +
  scale_x_continuous(limits = c(0, 160))
```
